bill_title: provide that the uniform administration of certain state taxes apply to the telecommunications gross receipts tax.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide that the uniform administration of certain state taxes apply to the telecommunications gross receipts tax. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-59-1 be amended to read as follows: 10-59-1. The provisions of this chapter apply to any taxes or fees or persons subject to taxes or fees imposed by, and to any civil or criminal investigation authorized by, chapters 10-33A, 10-39, 10-39A, 10-39B, 10-43, 10-45, 10-45D, 10-46, 10-46A, 10-46B, 10-46C, 10-46E, 10- 47B, 10-52, 10-52A, 32-3, 32-3A, 32-5, 32-5B, 32-6B, 32-9, 32-10, and 34A-13 and §§ 22-25- 48, 49-31-51, 50-4-13 to 50-4-17, inclusive, and the provisions of chapter 10-45B. Section 2. That chapter 10-59 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Notwithstanding the provisions of section 1 of this Act, no entity that has paid or is required to pay the telecommunications gross receipts tax of chapter 10-33A may request a refund pursuant to the provisions of this chapter for any time period before July 1, 2009. 225 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.04 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
